title: Mengxiang Jing Su
synopsis: A few years ago, the team led by Long Ze, known as one of the city's three masters, lost to the Titans who used conspiracy to win. Today, in order to be able to defeat the invincible Titan, Long Ze’s child, Long Ran, Long Xiang, took the journey of gathering partners. The two looked for the predecessors of the year and the current strong, overcoming various difficulties and invited them to return and enter. After that, under the strong training of Dr. Warring States, Long Ran and his partners got a huge improvement. Fight with the Beast God team and become a comrade-in-arms. In the end, in the battle with the Titans, through various difficulties and tests, and achieved the final victory. (translated from douban)

title: Yu Qi Lin Zhi Xian Ling Qi Yu
synopsis: The film tells the story of Xiaotian living in the fairyland. He has always dreamed of becoming a super fairy with spirit beasts like the descendants of the fairy. One day, by chance, Xiaotian and the ancient spirit beast Yu Qilin met. The two became good friends, and they met to travel the rivers and lakes together to participate in the fairy contest. During the journey, they continued to fight and conquered all kinds of strange spirit beasts. They also met celestial spiritist partners such as Feng'er and Longma. Everyone worked hard for their respective goals, and Xiaotian and Yu Qilin also Gradually discovered his true mission. (translated from douban)

title: Xinghai Qi Hang
synopsis: Earth teenagers Lei Lei and Jingjing accidentally saved the stray dog ​​Tuo Tuo and adopted it, but the strange collar that flashed around Tuo Tuo's neck caught their attention. One day Tuo Tuo suddenly disappeared. In the process of chasing Tuo Tuo, Lei Lei and Jingjing found countless earth animals with shining collars like Tuo Tuo in the forest. They all walked from all directions to the forest parked in the forest as if they were hypnotized. A strange spaceship. 　　 In order to save Tuo Tuo, Lei Lei and Jingjing ventured into the spacecraft and discovered that the spacecraft was originally on a mission to smuggle earth animals to a strange planet called Iron Slag. In order to suspend the flight of the spacecraft, Lei Lei and Jingjing, with the help of Mr. Green, a mechanic who was unwilling to be a smuggler, learned the basic essentials of spacecraft operation and started a fierce battle with the spacecraft of Ahuo, the leader of Iron Slag. Later, the animals were sent to the beautiful green planet. However, at this time, Emperor Iron Slag has re-organized a huge fleet and is following them... 　　 Leilei, Jingjing and a puppy were taken to the space cargo transfer station by the spacecraft of the Interstellar Zoo, and were involved in an interstellar animal smuggling case. While being abducted by the animal smugglers, Mr. Lu and Mr. Thin, the pilots of the spacecraft came forward to rescue them, and they escaped from the control of the emperor. At the same time, Mr. Thin overcame numerous difficulties, launched a secret investigation, grasped the first-hand evidence of Emperor Iron Slag's control of animal smuggling activities, and eventually defeated him.(translated from douban)

title: Liang Jia Funu
synopsis: The cartoon of "The Liang Family" is adapted from the comic work "The Liang Family" by the famous Hong Kong newspaper comic columnist "Cao Ri". It is based on an ordinary small family and reflects daily life in an active and beating rhythm. All kinds of big and small things portray a typical family in a big city, full of warmth and humor. The storytelling method is relaxed and funny, and it is a set of animated series with a wide range of objects. In the 26 episodes of the story, one episode reflects reality and satirizes life. It is a series of short dramas that closely follow the relationship between the characters. The laughter carries philosophy and is thought-provoking. (translated from douban)

title: Tuolaji Siji
synopsis: Once upon a time, there was a man surnamed Tang who was particularly unreliable. He didn't know where he came from or where he was going. He only knew that the tractor under his crotch had superpowers! So he was going all the way to the west, walking a distance, lighting a lamp, and helping some people relieve their troubles. The series of animation "Dragging" is a season broadcast, with 10 episodes in the first season. The story is based on the characters of "Journey to the West" as the protagonist. In a brand new overhead background, the protagonists Tang Shanzang, Sun Wukong, Zhu Baijie, and Sha Wujing all go all the way with the help of a "worry-relief tractor" with "superpowers" West, met many people with stories and embarked on a different adventure. (translated from douban)

title: Chao Bian Wu Shou
synopsis: A full year after defeating the Fire Giant, Tago, Zhuo Feng, Fei Ni, and Todi received acceptance letters from the God of War. After entering the War God Academy, they witnessed the extraordinary energy of the super-change God of War. Through the training of the college, their personal strength and teamwork have been continuously strengthened. Under the leadership of the cursed evil god, the dragon army hidden in the dark world is delusional to occupy the entire world. The super-changeable heroes led by Tago have gained friendship and hope in the battle with the dragon army, large and small, and gradually grown into the super-changeable god of war, and have a closer and tacit understanding with the martial beasts. But peace is short-lived. The extremely powerful dragon generals went to the War Seminary to launch attacks. Under unexpected attacks, the principal and the teacher fell one after another. Misfortune did not come singly, and the cursed evil god awakened from the seal also approached the college. In order to protect peace and justice, the super-changeable gods and the cursed evil god launched a final battle of life and death. Can the super-change gods guard the peace of the world?(translated from douban)

title: Okashi na Sabaku no Suna to Manu
synopsis: The story centers on the everyday life of the cats Suna and Manu, who live in a desert — a desert made of sugar instead of sand. (Source: ANN)

details.Japanese: おかしなさばくのスナとマヌ

title: Shenlan Shaonian
synopsis: Traditional energy is about to be exhausted. Dr. Huang Tianqi is working hard to study the pollution-free energy "Dark Blue Energy System". And his former assistant, Dr. A Jian, secretly carried out another mutation research, this kind of abnormal energy will be difficult for humans to control. Dr. Huang appoints Ming Fei and Huang Jinyu to find other dark blue boys. The five dark blue teenagers passed the test of their intelligence and will, and obtained five crystals that build the dark blue energy system, and at a critical moment prevented the explosion of Dr. Ajian's abnormal energy. The "Deep Blue Energy System" began to operate, delivering clean energy to the planet where humans live, and people are cheering towards a bright future.(translated from douban)

title: Heike Ju Ji Shou
synopsis: "Hacker Sniper" describes a new breakthrough in human scientific research in the future, but evil elements want to steal these scientific research results in order to achieve their goal of controlling the world. Their conspiracy and destruction have triggered a series of cyber crises. In the story, there are three witty teenagers. They are the three great computer masters of the electronic activity group of M Middle School. They stepped forward and launched a series of witty struggles against evil. The film incorporates elements of various science fiction themes such as detectives, science fiction, friendship, and affection. (translated from douban)

title: Fei
synopsis: "Fly" is a domestically produced original ancient war-blooded animation, the story is purely fictitious. The story is set in the Shaoxing peace talks. The Jinren and Qin Hui conspired to frame the Yue Family Army and sent people to assassinate Yue Fei. Yue Fei led the remaining dozens of Yue Family Army to resist desperately and resisted the Jinren for several months. The Jinren could not win, and finally passed Qin Hui. Framed Yue Fei and died in prison. "Flying" is an animated series of historical wars with Chinese characteristics aimed at Chinese teenagers aged 14-25. Adhere to original stories as the basic, with Chinese historical stories as the background, not only show ancient wars through stories, but also declare and awaken those fine traditions of China that have been completely forgotten.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Tuzi Bang
synopsis: In order to save Yutu Village from the energy crisis, the village head of Yutu Village sent rabbit Baizhi to the human society to find the missing Chang'e empress. When he first arrived in human society, Baizhi who did not understand human habits and habits hit the wall everywhere. Inadvertently Baizhi encountered human children Xiaozhong rescued him from the gangster, and in return for Baizhi, Xiaozhong took it into his home. After 　　, Bai Zhi’s friends in Yutu Village, Green Branch and Grey Branch, all came to human society to help Bai Zhi complete the task. The sudden arrival of several of them brought joy and surprise to the Xiaozhong family. 　　 But the crisis is waiting for them. Bai Zhi's elder brother Hei Zhi is also leading his group of evil friends, looking for Chang'e Empress in the world, wanting to absorb the power of Tianyue. 　　 A battle between good and evil gradually kicked off... (translated from douban)

title: Tuzi Bang 2
synopsis: The story takes place on the remote mysterious island-Crab Island! What thrilling story happened on the island? Why did the Rabbit Gang get caught up in the fight for the "boss" position? Will the stubborn gray branch be elected not only with righteousness alone? Or is it Young Master Bai Zhi, a candidate for village chief who has nothing to do all day, and takes the thirty-six plan as the best plan? And on the mysterious Crab Island, who is that group of life and death partners? For what purpose did you betray everyone? One mystery after another? Continuous emergencies? Smart, can you guess the truth the first time? Uncover all the mysteries? (translated from douban)

title: Tuzi Bang Di 3 Ji Jixie Shi Lianmeng
synopsis: The complete animated story of the Bunny Gang’s Mechanic Alliance is about the human protagonist Xiaozhong looking for his missing father. Xiaozhong and his mother accepted a task. Xiaozhong’s mother felt that the man in the task was like Xiaozhong’s father, so she came to the location of the task. They were surprised to find that the task was related to the Luban Union and the Dark Night Sect. The gear of fate Start turning. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 兔子帮 第3季 机械师联盟

title: Sheng Guang Bu Hao Re
synopsis: In order to become a god-like man in the legend of the Holy Light, the rookie priest embarked on an adventure against the Ash Legion, and met various strange teammates on the way. They fought side by side and trusted each other, which was never expected. (translated from douban)

title: Wuz Pao——Yuan Zi Ya Baowei Zhan
synopsis: The key animation "Wu Zi Pao-Defense of Yuanzi Cliff" to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the victory of the Anti-Japanese War. Yuanziya Village, located in Junan County, Shandong Province, is China’s "First Village of the Chinese Anti-Japanese War". On December 20, 1941, under the guidance of the Communist Party of China, all the villagers united and fought against the Japanese with earth and guns. The "Defense Battle of Yuanziya" that killed the enemy and annihilated more than 100 Japanese and puppet troops took place here.(translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Du Du
synopsis: The play focuses on invention and creation, depicting the two main characters on Dudubao: the inventor Kakadu and his follower Bobodu. Kakadu will invent anything that is particularly magical, full of wisdom and imagination, but once this thing is in Bobodu's hands, it will always produce unexpected effects, but it will make the inventor Kakadu in an embarrassing or embarrassing situation. Bobodu looks stupid, but in fact he is often wise and foolish; while Kakadu looks extremely smart, but in fact, it is often flawed and self-defeating. The two characters themselves are a pair of contradictions, making the story full of wit and humor, full of logic and imagination, and inspiring. (translated from douban)

title: XingjiBobao
synopsis: This is a column that introduces everything in the universe and popular science knowledge in life from a scientific perspective. We will tell you everything related to science, and I will tell you anything related to pseudoscience! Update once a week, throw away the morals and pack light on the road. This is true wisdom! "Interstellar Broadcasting"——This is a column that introduces everything in the universe and popular science knowledge in life from a scientific perspective. We will tell you everything related to science, and I will also tell you about pseudoscience ! Update once a week, throw away the morals and pack light on the road. This is true wisdom! (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Zhuo Ma
synopsis: The story takes place in the beautiful Tibetan Plateau. In order to protect the elven Tibetan antelopes and banshee poisonous spiders, green geckos, and red bats, the little Zhuoma fought against the bad guys, withstood various severe tests, and found the extremely beautiful lake of dreams. In the end, he defeated the devil king scorpion and the lame poisonous spider, and brought the seven forty-nine Tibetan antelopes to the Emerald Island in the Lake of Dreams... (translated from baidu)

title: Xiao Zhuo Ma 2
synopsis: The whole play always revolves around the clue of the hunting and protection of Tibetan antelopes, and interprets a mythical story with ups and downs and vivid twists and turns. The Tibetan antelopes are free spirits of the plateau land. In order to protect this noble population, the old Tibetan antelope king gave his life in a duel with a poisonous spider trying to hunt the Tibetan antelope. Gesanghua gave birth to the innocent, kind, smart, and brave Tibetan girl Dolma in his legacy. In the primeval forest, she and Zhuo Qi were helped by birds, beasts, flowers and trees. In order to defeat poisonous spiders and protect the Tibetan antelope flock, they withstood various tests and finally found the extremely beautiful Lake of Dreams, and finally defeated the devil scorpion and the lame poisonous spider, and brought seven or seventy-nine Tibetan antelope flocks. On the emerald island of the lake of dreams... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Nami Xueyuan
synopsis: In the inner world of "Nano Core", all the protagonists and supporting characters and heroes must study and live in the "Nano Academy". In this world, everyone does not take classes, exams, and leads weird campus routines seriously, protects the world without seriousness, and keeps "showing friendship" to everyone in their own ways. (translated from douban)

title: Piao Chong Bei Bei Zhi Wu Long Mofa
synopsis: While the content of "Ladybug Beibei's Oolong Magic" is healthy and upbeat, it completely gets rid of the boring preaching of traditional domestic cartoons. The whole series integrates family, friendship, adventure, bravery, struggle and other elements. The story unfolds from the protagonist Bei Bei to the beautiful Liuquan Paradise. The smart and kind-hearted Beibei is an adventurous orphan, but he is brave and optimistic. Here, Beibei met several partners with different personalities. The film uses five partners to pursue dreams and learn magic, while fighting against the spider family who strayed into the paradise, saving the exotic flower prince as the main line, with a relaxed and interesting plot, humorous and humorous. The dialogue is a highlight! Lead the small audience into a magical world full of magic...(translated from douban)

title: Piao Chong Bei Bei Zhi Shenmi Gongchang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Piao Chong Bei Bei Zhi Zhengjiu Gu Shu Zhen
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 瓢虫贝贝之拯救古树镇

title: Xiaoxiong Ni Ao Zhi Mengjing Xiao Zhen
synopsis: The place where the story begins is a fairy tale-like world, in a mysterious place created by dreams floating in the clouds-Dream Town, where bear bear, his family and many lovely friends live. The biggest charm of the dream town is that all dreams can be realized in this place, and only dreamers can live in the dream town. Therefore, the residents in the town are very interesting. They live together happily and put their dreams together. The town has become very beautiful and has become a paradise that everyone dreams of. (translated from douban)

title: Xiaoxiong Ni Ao Zhi Huanqiu Luxing
synopsis: Little Bear Neo and Mummy Bear live in a beautiful town. Papa Bear is a very wise inventor and scientist. He made a super robot horse for Neo-Mike Horse. Neo and Mike Horse became good partners. One day, Neo, Mike Ma, Sisi, Ninja Frog, and Dr. Gudong accidentally activated the space-time shuttle device in Neo’s laboratory, and the laboratory carried them to other places on the earth.(translated from douban)

title: Chongchong Yu Long Long
synopsis: "Chong Chong and Dragon Dragon" tells that when the toy world is corroded by the dark stone, the four guardian gods of the wisdom tree and humans (Xiao Chong, etc.) unite to fight against all controlled toys and forge the charm of the brave to fight against grievances. The story that saved the entire toy world and the human world. Expressing love and courage will eventually defeat evil, while admonishing us to cherish our relatives, friends, and all the good things around us. (translated from douban)

title: Hong Hai Er Chuanqi
synopsis: If the King Shura's conspiracy to capture the innate universe egg succeeds, it will endanger the stability of the earth. Guanyin Bodhisattva is worried about this, and the story begins below. The white parrot and the variety have climbed to the peak, wanting to rendezvous with the red boy as soon as possible, but the despicable man is poorly labored and turned into a beetle by the Asura King. Gandapo and the demon fox became kind old men and old ladies, and poisoned the red boy with poisonous water. Fortunately, they were rescued by various colors. At this time the big volcano erupted, and Hong Haier used the last secret spell to knock down King Ashura, and the world was restored to peace. Hong Haier and his kind and brave companions sang and danced with joy.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiayi Xiao Qingtian
synopsis: As China’s first large-scale three-dimensional detective martial arts animation, "The Chivalrous Little Blue Sky" is based on traditional Chinese culture and incorporates the well-known traditional martial arts story "Seven Chivalry and Five Righteousness". It tells Bao Zheng as the protagonist in his youth. The stories of young friends such as Zhan Zhao and Wushu who used courage and wisdom to solve various complicated cases fully demonstrated the wise image of the young Bao Zheng, who was not afraid of difficulties and persevering in justice. Let people appreciate the visual impact brought by the beautiful pictures while promoting many national quintessence in the Chinese culture(translated from douban)

title: Hai Baolaile
synopsis: Haibao is the guardian of the Rainbow City, an elf who helps mankind. He has super powers and can save mankind. It looks simple and cute, but in fact it is wise and foolish. One day, Doll Planet sent the destroyer Chou Chou. As the guardian of the Rainbow City, Haibao and Chou Chou fought. These are the main conflicting characters in the story. But Chou Chou is not a simple negative image. He comes from an alien planet, and that planet is in trouble because of problems with its development model. The creatures on the doll planet have lost their original sense of true feelings, but there are beautiful things hidden in the ugly heart, so they are finally influenced by the people of Haibao and Rainbow City. (translated from douban)

title: Hai Baolaile season2
synopsis: season 2 of it.

title: Hai Baolaile season3
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Tan Tan Mao Zhi Qihuan Maxi Tuan
synopsis: Our story takes place in a place near the equator called ‘Huantianxidi Town’. The town’s climate is very mild throughout the year. The sun, beaches, coconut trees, and people wearing all kinds of bright clothes make it a holiday paradise. Recently, a very special circus has ushered here. Why is it special? Because in the circus, except for the bearded head, all the other members are animals. They are Monkey Smile, Elephant Allen, Little Rabbit Crystal, Panther Lina, etc. Oh, there are three little guys, a cat, a parrot, and a pig. They are respectively-the detective cat who dreams of becoming a great detective; he thinks he is the most beautiful parrot in the world, Xiao Feihong; delicious, lazy, cute and cute, but these three little guys are not circus actors. , They are just responsible for the chores. From the group leader to the animals, they all like ‘Huantianxidi Town’ too much, so they decided to stay here. They believe that their performance will surely make the people and animals here laugh and bring them joy. (translated from douban)

title: Tan Tan Mao Zhi Qihuan Maxi Tuan2
synopsis: season2 of it.

title: Tan Tan Mao Qimiao Shijie
synopsis: A group of happy animal residents live in the beautiful environment of Happy Village. The protagonist Tan Tan Mao is a small engineer in the village. In addition to maintaining the facilities and interests of the village, he has a more ambitious goal, which is to write a book "Wonderful World Encyclopedia" to benefit everyone. Suddenly one day, a huge smoke exhaust pipe was erected at the side of the small village. The scheming Dr. Oolong built an oolong factory here. He used special ore materials from the small village to produce super-strong batteries with toxicity. The surrounding environment is polluted, and the villagers are extremely full of it. 　　Dr. Oolong’s evil invention brought all kinds of troubles to Happy Village, but under the leadership of Tantan Mao, the villagers began to take action. Tantanmao relies on the power of knowledge and the help of his friends Doudouzhu and Xiao Feihong to defeat Dr. Oolong's conspiracy time and time again.(translated from douban)

title: Tan Tan Mao Qimiao Shijie Di Er Ji
synopsis: Explore Maodoudouzhu and other good friends. They are brave and full of vigor and dare to fight against all evil forces that intend to destroy "happiness". They are kind and love life, and are willing to explore the magical phenomena in the wonderful world of life. Has Tantanmao's "Wonderful World Encyclopedia" completed? What interesting and thrilling stories happened to the friends? Let us look forward to it together. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 探探猫奇妙世界 第二季

title: Yin Mi
synopsis: In order to prevent the increasing number of social crimes, various countries have responded and joined the global human mind purification plan, called the "SOS" plan (SPIRIT OF SOUND) for short. This plan has two major goals of "purifying the mind and social harmony". Music Is the main educational tool. This gives the music industry an opportunity for criminals. Under the leadership of the smashing band-BLACK MONDAY (Black Monday), a new realm of combining business and music was born. In this era, products represented or marketed by the orchestra must be popular with the public. They have become endorsement targets for all walks of life, and these products promoted by BLACK MONDAY look good, but under the beautiful packaging, there are various crises hidden. 　　 The three heroines of this story, FAY, UNA, and NELLY, are young girls from different backgrounds. They all have a mysterious potential for music in their bodies. Many jokes are often made because of this potential. All three of them are loyal fans of BLACK MONDAY, chasing their favorite band like everyone else. At a concert, the three people accidentally discovered the true face of BLACK MONDAY. The orchestra used the magic power from the mysterious music box to compile a music code to control the audience's thinking. The three were chased by BLACK MONDAY. The mysterious old Berduff helped and rescued them from the deadlock. From this, Duff told a bitter past...(translated from douban)

title: Qianfang Gaoneng Zhi Huaji
synopsis: Famous Post Bar with Funny Emoticons After returning to the post bar world, I found that there was an emoji like myself that replaced my position in Post Bar. In order to regain his own post bar identity and status, Huoqi teamed up with Guoqi Internet celebrity God Annoy Dog to challenge the fake comic forces.(translated from douban)

title: Qianfang Gaoneng Zhi La Ji
synopsis: In human mobile phones, there is a world of emoticons, but suddenly one day, an electromagnetic king who has come from an unknown world is about to destroy the entire emoticon. Tieba emoticon net celebrity comics and his friend God Annoying Dog start a paragraph An adventure to save the emoji world. (translated from douban)

title: Qianfang Gaoneng Zhi Shen Fan Gou
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Haha Hua Xiao Ji
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Er Er Er Ha Qi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Haha Xiyou Xing
synopsis: "Hahaxi Parade" tells the story of Zhu Bajie, Drifting, and Xiao Bailong experiencing all sorts of thrills and fun, and finally reached the western sky. When editing the story, the author boldly borrowed the methods of other art categories such as movies and sketches, adding humor and nonsensical funny, so that people can feel the truth, goodness, beauty, happiness and warmth of life in laughter. The content has the magical colors of gods and monsters, but also incorporates a large number of modern scenes and languages. In the time and space, the fashion elements and the use of the same place names as in "Journey to the West" make people full of imagination.(translated from douban)

title: Fuxing Ba Jie
synopsis: The Bajie group of four came to the legendary tree city—"the city of blessings"! This wonderful city is built in layers on a huge tree, the vertical branches are elevators, and the lovely fungus becomes a pole of street lights, illuminating the beetle "taxi" passing by. There is a firefly square in the center of the city, surrounded by skyscrapers, clubs, and bubble baths. The happy four-member group held a concert in Firefly Plaza, used music to "break" into Dudu City, and with the help of the raccoon principal, they had their own home in Dudu City-a small petal-shaped residence. There is a piece of melon land that Bajie loves most. The happy foursome started a colorful life in Dudu City, super super fun activities in the city, strange festivals every three to five, of course, the crocodile group who always goes against the happy foursome is indispensable. Ba Jie relies on sincerity and perseverance, of course, there is no less natural blessing. It brought joy and happiness to the residents of Dudu City. In the end, the head of the garden awarded Bajie Dudu City the title of "Fuxing"! The group of four lives happily in Dudu City... (translated form douban)

title: Fuxing Ba Jie Zhi Da Nian Xiao Guai
synopsis: The film is a story about New Year's Eve, friendship and homecoming! The New Year is approaching. People in Fuxingshucheng are actively preparing for the New Year's dressing party. It is said that whoever dresses up the most interesting will get a "New Year's wish" from the principal. The Bajie group of four gave up the "New Year's Wish" competition and, despite the trouble of being misunderstood, helped a black-haired monster "go home" that was afraid of others. The cartoons are warm and moving, full of surprises and joy. (translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao
synopsis: The protagonist Star Cat is a naughty mischief who wants to be a hero. But inadvertently caused a catastrophe-the evil Dark Lord was released, causing chaos in the world! Star Cat was punished to commit crimes and perform meritorious services. With the assistance of a small computer, Ou Yingwan, he visited 12 countries and gathered the power of 12 warriors, and finally defeated the evil Dark Lord. (translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season2
synopsis: The world was in chaos. The Dark Lord wounded the guards of the Celestial Star and the Great God, and fled to the human world! The star cat who caused the trouble was punished with guilt and meritorious service. He got the earth to get the Dark Lord back! The kind-hearted fairy sister reminded him that he can ask for the help of the brave men of the 12 constellations; but of course it is not the original ones, but the new generation of brave men.(translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season3
synopsis: The Black Demon used magic power to turn the teeth that fell on the Celestial Star into a dragon tooth soldier and mess around everywhere. The curly hair that has evolved to attack the Dragon Tooth Soldier, but more and more fights. Just when she was at a loss, Wei Wei exuded a strong light of purification to wipe out the Dragon Tooth Soldier in one fell swoop. However, because the Dark Lord's teeth were swallowed by the dog general by mistake, Dragonfang soldiers continued to appear. Weiwei ran into the ugly Dragon Tooth Soldier, and because of fear, she gathered energy and turned into a crystal ball to return to the earth. Weiwei and Grandpa drove the Aquarius to use the crystal ball energy to travel to the earth together, and the crystal ball entered a different-dimensional channel. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season4
synopsis: Star Cat has gained countless knowledge from the seniors invited by Dali Cat. Seniors expect him to use this knowledge to protect himself and defeat the bad guys that destroy the peace of the universe. The black hole missile launched by Awei smashed the villain into pieces, and a huge black hole appeared in the universe. The damaged transport plane crashed to the earth. Fragments with strong pollution power flew toward Celestial Star. Xiaoji is in danger to save Xiaomi and Xiaofeng. There was also an explosion in Taibai's house. The shock wave caused by the black hole bomb reached the earth, and electronic equipment failed. Balloon City can only use balloons to float in the air, and the Gemini tribe recruited pterodactyls as a means of transportation. In the Aquarius tribe, the old man rescued the children in the truck, and prepared to find a doctor to help everyone solve their difficulties with science. Xiao Aniu traveled down the mountain alone, went to the North Pole to shoot the aurora, and became friends with the kind Vikings, and the badass minions and walruses followed...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season5
synopsis: The crisis of the Celestial Star has not yet been resolved, but a new threat comes immediately after the Great Celestial God and the crowd are surrounded by dragon tooth soldiers. Under the birth of the Demonized Duplicator, the evil dog general has come to the world! Relying on the overwhelming dark power of the evil dog general, not only the people of the Celestial Star were subdued by the evil forces, but worse, the demonized copy machine copied the evil version of the people headed by the Great God. A mysterious figure appeared in the UFO City. He not only launched an attack on the crowd, but also forcibly took away the water monster! The trouble is that the star cat under attack is poisoned, and only the purifying power of Weiwei can detoxify the star cat. However, Wei Weiran did not have confidence in her abilities and was unwilling to try, but with the trust and encouragement of everyone, Wei Wei not only saved the Star Cat, but also successfully mastered the power of purification. Ash and the dragonfly fought fiercely. During the fierce battle, the dragonfly monster evolved into a basilisk again... (translated from baidu baike)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season6
synopsis: Beside the volcano, a roar tore through the black smoke, and the basilisk that ravaged the Balloon City appeared in it. Although the Star Cat successfully activated the Constellation Armor, it was far from the opponent of the Basilisk. Through Ou Yingwan's strong stimulation, although the Constellation Armor evolved to the next form, his anger actually made the armor rush! The star cat, who lost control, continuously launched fierce and frantic attacks, killing the basilisk and fleeing. Star Cat was mistakenly blown to Wuzhu Mountain by the power of the basilisk. After several discussions between Star Cat and Master Aniu, Star Cat decided to learn from him the invincible martial arts in order to defeat the Dark Lord. The first level is to defeat Yunren in Zizhu Forest, and he is trying to climb Wuzhu Mountain. In the process, the star cat’s constellation armor is also being trained by Master Aniu, and Master Aniu also accepts it as his apprentice! On Celestial, the evil dog general swept everything. No one on Celestial was his opponent, but because of his strong desire to fight, the easy victory not only did not bring him joy, but made him very disappointed. At this moment, he learned of the existence of the earth and immediately decided to attack the earth...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season7
synopsis: Weiwei and his family entertained everyone in the castle for a celebration banquet, but the happy time is always short. With the guidance of the Dark Lord, the demonized pirate group came again at night with an army of monsters. Curly hair and strange cards struggled to resist the waves of attacks from external monsters. Some monsters invaded the castle from the underground. Seeing that Vivi's parents were about to encounter danger, Vivi finally used her constellation ability to successfully transform and the purification angel appeared! After Weiwei transformed, Shuai Ge also mobilized the power of Libra's constellation and transformed into a gorgeous nobleman, showing the powerful power of Libra. The power he used to balance the good and evil successfully caused the monster group to coax, but the evil force missed the curly hair, causing the Aries Warrior to go into a frantic runaway state. With the raging Curls and the monsters fighting fiercely, Weiwei's house became ruins. In the end, Curly finally recovered his mind, but he also lost the memory of the runaway...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao season8
synopsis: After the transformation, the power of the fire demon was unstoppable, and the star cat, a flash god who did not block the fire demon's attack, was wounded and fell into the valley. Although the constellation warriors arrived one after another, it was unexpected that the fire demon turned into the ultimate form again to reverse the situation. Seeing that the situation is getting worse and worse, Ah Niu blew the long-collected Dragon's horn, gained the mysterious power of the God of War Thor, arrived in real time in the form of a Taurus armor, and successfully rescued everyone. Then, under the strategy of the strange card and the other constellation fighters, he finally defeated the fire demon. With the help of the little angels, the Celestial star, which had been unable to reach it, finally connected again. It turned out that General Evil Dog occupied the entire Celestial Star, and the Great Celestial God also disappeared. Taibai, General Dog and his party were all caught in the dungeon. Fortunately, Arthur and Ale, the junkyard manager who were not caught in the dungeon, rescued everyone from a secret channel and found the sleeping battle judge and executioner. The Celestial star launched a big counterattack...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Xingkong Da Maoxian
synopsis: The star cat and the zodiac warrior sealed the Dark Lord in the depths of the universe. Time passed. Three hundred years later, a new generation of Little Star Cats was born. In order to one day be able to fight the Dark Lord like the idol he admired, Xiaoxingmao has never relaxed about the learning of knowledge and his own training. On this day, Uranus discovered the remains of the Star Cat base. Little Star Cat and the twelve constellation partners sneaked into the spacecraft and were having fun. Suddenly the figure of the Dark Lord appeared in the sky again! In front of Little Star Cat who didn't know what to do, the message left by Star Cat and his friends three hundred years ago suddenly appeared. As early as three hundred years ago, Star Cat had predicted that the Dark Lord would release the seal one day, so he left three treasures! Little Star Cat and her friends are here...(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫历险记之星空大冒险

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Gucheng Da Maoxian
synopsis: In order to defend the peace of the universe and the peace of the earth, the Star Cats team chased the black monsters and minions to the ancient earth. In time and space, evading the chasing little black monsters, leading his men to drive robots into the lantern festival in Nanjing during the Ming Dynasty. The lanterns at the scene were petrified because the little black monsters frantically absorbed the spiritual light, and people fell into panic. The Star Cats team arrived, and the two sides fought fiercely in the air. The little black monster dispatched a secret weapon, the black monster combined robot, to disperse the Star Cat combined robot with unexpectedly powerful firepower. The Star Cat team was forced to retreat, and the Hayate, who voluntarily left behind for cover, lost its energy and was stranded outside Nanjing in the early Ming Dynasty. base.(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫历险记之古城大冒险

title: Xingkong Jiuyuan Dui
synopsis: There is a starry sky rescue team on the planet Celestial. They use advanced science and technology to shuttle to various planets to carry out disaster relief. Captain Star Cat found that the fire accidents on the Celestial planet had been unusually frequent recently. The new team members curled up on inspections and found strange figures, but they were surrounded by strangers. At the moment, Captain Star Cat rescued Curly. They discovered that the leader of the weirdo was Ji Pengxing's prince of chili sauce. It turned out that Ji Pengxing’s environment was severely damaged due to over-development. The prince of Chili Sauce ordered his subordinates to create fires and other disasters on the Celestial Star, in order to dominate the Celestial Star. In order to protect their hometown, members of the Starry Sky Rescue Team and [1] Jipeng Stars fought. Xingmao and others used their wisdom to sneak into the Jipeng star warship, severely damaged the warship, and eliminated the crisis of the Celestial Star.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xing Mao Zhi Da Xiao Xiyou
synopsis: The evil black demon made a comeback again, summoned the four dark kings, extended the invading demon's hands to the ancient Western Regions, and sent minions to move around in the ancient Western Regions, constantly plundering the local spiritual light. In order to maintain the civilization of the universe and defend the spiritual light of the earth, Star Cat led the warriors of the twelve constellations in a fierce confrontation with new enemies in the ancient Western Regions. (translated fro iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Diqiu Da Maoxian
synopsis: The plans of the little black monsters and other dark forces were repeatedly shattered by Star Cat and his friends, and the Dark Lord became furious. In order to collect a larger amount of spiritual light as soon as possible to unlock the seal on his body, the Dark Lord anxiously instructed the little black monster to destroy the river that has nurtured the five thousand years of civilization of the Chinese nation, and destroy all things related to Chinese civilization along the way. At the same time, the cosmic guard led by Starcat noticed this conspiracy of the Dark Lord and decided to stop their sabotage, defend the birthplace of Chinese civilization, and maintain world peace. The battle between justice and evil is about to begin. What kind of evil tactics and conspiracies such as the little black monsters will use, and how should our star cat and his alien partners face it... (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫历险记之地球大冒险

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Meishi Pian
synopsis: In order to protect the peace of the universe, the star cats and the patron saints of the 12 constellations have been fighting against the Dark Lord. This time, the Kung Fu cat of the Star Cat tribe followed the two men of the Dark Lord in a battle in the universe. During the fierce battle, the Kung Fu Cat and the spaceship under the Dark Lord crashed at the same time. On a strange planet, the Kung Fu Cat was fortunately rescued by the Curly Aries. The strange thing is that Curly doesn't even know the Kung Fu Cat, who is also the Guardian of Light. According to Curly, this is the planet where the 12 constellation family lives. On this planet similar to ancient China, the 12 constellation family lives under the rule of the Lion King. However, in this world, there is no star cat family. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Gongfu Xing Mao
synopsis: Star cat martial arts training, martial arts experience and comprehension of martial arts become obsessed with martial arts masters accidentally obtained a "five-star stone" with magical power, but the twin brothers want to use the five-star stone to unite the world and brothers fight the wall. The master of the star cat in the panic implanted the star stone into the star cat, and the star cat changed abnormally, except that the exclusion type remained cat-like, and its behavior and thinking were no different from humans. Four Kung Fu star cats came to the capital and set up the "Star Cat Express" company as a business. While practicing martial arts, the star cats searched for the missing master. In the daily life of quick work, the four kung fu star cats use wit and kung fu to solve various difficulties or situations encountered. With the development of the story in each episode, the protagonist grows in personality, mentality, ability, skill, and ability to solve problems.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Gongfu Xing Mao2
synopsis: Since retrieving the master, the life of the four star cats has gradually returned to the right track, and as a result, they have gradually become lazy towards martial arts. The opponent "Extreme Express" dropped the battle book to "Star Cat Express", and at this moment, Master suddenly disappeared strangely! In order to find Master, the star cats went up and down the mountain and sea. Although they felt very hard, they also realized invisibly: It turned out that what Master wanted to tell the star cats was the truth of martial arts, and asked the star cats to return to the original point to face themselves and break through. The limits of self!(translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Mingsheng Pian
synopsis: The Dark Lord escaped from the interstellar prison! The first thing he did when the Demon King regained his freedom was to go straight to the home of the interstellar judge, and to avenge his sentence of imprisonment. Star cat watched his parents fall into the boundless depths of the galaxy during the battle, in order to save Parents, to punish the Dark Lord, Star Cat decides to scroll with his friends and follow the Dark Lord all the way to the earth. Star Cat and Xiao Juan’s spaceship crashed and fell to China, and they met the female cat Mimi in Xi’an. The three struggled with the Dark Lord all the way, and the dangers were all around. Fortunately, they were united and cooperated to overcome the difficulties one by one, and cultivated the revolutionary emotion of sharing weal and woe . In addition to the adventurous and wonderful story, the film brings out the unique geographical environment of various places in a more profound and simple way. The relaxed and funny dialogues and the compact story plot allow Star Cat to take the audience together.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Mingsheng Pian season2
synopsis: After being defeated by the Star Cat, the Dark Lord was imprisoned in the depths of a desolate and cold abandoned planet, and his crime evidence, the magic crystal, was sealed in the highest secret room of the interstellar headquarters. Legend has it that magic crystals can reflect all mirror-like energy, such as water and ice. Of course, including the hearts of the people... The annual interstellar celebration is about to be held. At the same time as the celebration is unveiled, the magic crystal in the secret room is stolen... Suddenly the interstellar headquarters emits a huge explosion, and the orange flame illuminates the entire starry sky, strong The shock wave of the 12 constellations instantly blasted out of the interstellar headquarters! In the chaos, the interstellar judge handed the Starcat universe compass. He worriedly told Starcat that someone in the interstellar headquarters was lured by the evil power of the magic crystal and stole the magic crystal, and the only warrior of the 12 planets who could control the magic crystal was exploded. Depart from the original track. When the next total solar eclipse occurs, the evil power of the magic crystal will reach the highest point. At that time, if the star cat does not find the 12 planet warrior, the universe will fall into the rule of the dark forces, so the star dad requires the star cat to be the shortest...(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 快乐星猫之名胜篇 第2季

title: Xing Mao Zhi Xiyu Mi Zong
synopsis: The four kings of darkness came to the ancient Silk Road, wanting to gain more spiritual light by controlling the leader of the Xiongnu tribe and grabbing the wealth of the people and caravans on the Silk Road. In order to protect the ancient Silk Road, Star Cat and his friends worked together and finally defeated the enemy.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Zhentan
synopsis: "Star Cat Detective" is a series with detective reasoning stories as the main content. Each episode is a separate film, showing a complete process of solving the case. With Star Cat as the protagonist, he has repeatedly helped the self-righteous Inspector Liu of the Star City Police to solve many suspicious stories. Each of the 12 constellations has a unique skill or ability. For Star Cat’s friends, one or more will appear in each episode to help Star Cat solve the case. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Donghua Xilie Zhi Gongyi Xiaopin
synopsis: The public welfare sketches are divided into 5 series. Each series uses vivid stories to tell some of the problems we encounter in daily life, and through these stories, people know how to deal with and deal with environmental protection, compliance with traffic, healthy diet and other issues , And establish a correct outlook on life, values, ethics and social honor and disgrace. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫动画系列之公益小品

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Guohua Pian
synopsis: The star cats led the 12 constellations and the dark forces led by the Dark Lord in a secret fierce battle on the top of Mount Hua. The two sides fought for hundreds of rounds, and the star cats and the 12 constellations were forced to the edge of the cliff, and the danger was reborn. At this time, I happened to meet an old scholar who was drying the famous painting "A River at Qingming Festival", which was soaked in the sun. The harmonious and prosperous atmosphere of the picture immediately increased the energy of Star Cat and his partners. The unique tricks they played were combined with the power of painting. Transfiguration into a super weapon, frustrated the Dark Lord and his party members, and finally the Dark Lord escaped alone. This contest made the Black Demon realize the powerful "spiritual light" contained in "Shanghe River on Qingming Festival", so he ordered the little black monsters to study "Riverside on Qingming Festival". It’s a pity that the little black monster’s mind has not evolved, and it is impossible to study the mystery. However, he mistakenly discovered that many famous paintings other than "The River on the Qingming Festival" contain a powerful "spiritual light", so he conspired to start with "The River on the Qingming Festival" Start, go back to ancient China to prevent the artist from creating ancient paintings. Fortunately, the star cat and the 12 constellations were discovered in time, in order to secretly protect the painter and the associated scenery...(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Shufa Pian
synopsis: During a time-space transition, the little black monster got a parchment scroll depicting the restoration of the dark forces. The Dark Lord can use this mysterious sheepskin scroll to find the spiritual light hidden in any specific time and space in the ancient Chinese origin and can take it as his own. In order to completely eliminate the ambition of the Dark Lord to dominate the world, the Star Cats and the 12 constellations have gone through time and space adventures, seizing the sheepskin scroll and sending it back to its original place. The star cats and the 12 constellation family are competing with the Dark Lord and his subordinates again and again for peace and tranquility in the universe. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Zhentan Pian
synopsis: The Star Cat who lives in Star City is a famous detective in the city. He is usually funny and humorous, but he is serious when handling cases. He likes to write mystery novels but has never published because of his poor writing. Since the self-righteous Inspector Liu has taken over the city security After that, strange crimes in the city continued, and the rate of solving crimes dropped. The helpless Liu could only invite Star Cat to help him solve the case. Star Cat is not a lone ranger, he has 12 partners with special skills to help him. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Zhi Sunzi Bingfa Pian
synopsis: The Star Cat Cultural Lecture Series invites the famous cartoon master Cai Zhizhong to participate in the production, combined with the advantages of the Star Cat brand image, and interprets traditional culture through animation in a simple and understandable way. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wanpi De Xiao Xing Mao
synopsis: In a beautiful cat villa, Little Star Cat and his parents live. This is a happy and warm family of three. The cooking mother is gentle and virtuous. She is always busy in the kitchen, but she is a little nagging to the little star cat; the serious dad is always unsmiling and is often abrupt by the little star cat’s behavior It makes me dumbfounding, but occasionally there are naughty moments of childlike innocence; as for the little star cat, needless to say, he is always the most troublesome troublemaker at home when he is busy. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Xing Mao Mohuan Yuezhang
synopsis: Music-loving Fu Xiaoyin rescued a little cat on the way home-a music elf who called himself "Star Cat". In order to prevent the beloved music from disappearing from the world, Fu Xiaoyin, who is too timid and unable to give full play to his musical talent, must help Star Cat collect 13 musical note Xiaoxiaoxian scattered in the world within three months. During this period of time, Xiaoyin’s friendship and talents were tested. Eventually, as she grew up, she overcame her shortcomings and became more independent and strong. In the end, she not only saved the world’s music, but also used her musical talents to become the opening of Tomorrow’s Universal Expo. Music performance candidate. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Wenming Pian
synopsis: They all revolve around the theme of the star cat, and the story traverses many different spaces, from the star star where the protagonist star cat is located to the different territories of the 12 constellations. The exchange of space drives the development of the entire storyline. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Lixian Ji Zhi Shenhua Pian
synopsis: "Star Cat Adventure: Mythology" tells the story of the "cosmic guard" represented by the star cat, who has been fighting the Dark Lord. Now, the Dark Lord has brought a new round of crisis! In the end, Star Cat used his own wisdom and went through hardships to return the entire ancient era to the normal category. In this way, with the efforts of Star Cat, Curl and Aniu gradually got rid of their bad habits, and gained the power of the characters in the myth. Finally, they worked together to defeat the Dark Lord. The mythical world of the entire ancient age has returned to normal... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xiao Xing Mao
synopsis: In the distant star paradise, there are white clouds floating in the blue sky. There are many happy children living there. They often visit each other on small clouds. In this pure and white world, they laugh and play together, help and love each other, and explore all kinds of unknown new things together, always full of curiosity. The protagonist of the story is a particularly curious child-Star Cat. He likes to spread happiness to the people around him. He is the soul figure in the group. He often takes his good friends to discover interesting new things. His best friends are Ajie, who is slow in everything, big names who are pushy, curly curly, and Jiajia who is timid and shy. The children grow up happily in the star heaven. If you listen carefully, you can hear their crisp laughter from the distant horizon... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Taoqi Xing Mao
synopsis: Xingmao and his 12 friends live in Xingxing Village. This is a leisurely small village with a carefree life. It faces the sea on the east, the mountains on the west, the endless desert and forest on the north, and the road to the outside on the south. world. Star Cat is a naughty little guy. His daily fun is to try his best to play tricks on his friends, but Victory will not always stand by his side, so sometimes he will be tricked by others. In this way, the days passed day by day, no one knew what the meaning of their lives was, even they themselves didn’t know, until one day...their lives were changed, and Star Cat accidentally opened the seal of the Dark Lord. The Dark Lord who opened the seal wanted to rule the world, but due to being sealed for centuries, his mana became extremely weak, so the Dark Lord was waiting to restore his mana, while planning the steps to rule the world should start with ruling this small village. But every time the plan was deliberately or unintentionally destroyed by Star Cat’s naughty and his friends, in the later...(translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Meishi Pian
synopsis: In the vast expanse of the universe, in addition to the earth where humans live, there are many different races living on different planets... Our protagonist, Star Cat, the most admired person is the Vigorous Cat of the same race. According to legend, the Vigorous Cat and the 12-constellation brave together defeated the evil villain, the Black Devil, and restored peace to the universe. One day, he discovered a secret cave. Because of his mischief, the Dark Lord imprisoned in the cave was released. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Gongyi Pian
synopsis: In the vast expanse of the universe, in addition to the earth where humans live, there are many different races living on different planets... Our protagonist, Star Cat, the most admired person is the Vigorous Cat of the same race. According to legend, the Vigorous Cat and the 12-constellation brave together defeated the evil villain, the Black Devil, and restored peace to the universe. One day, he discovered a secret cave. Because of his mischief, the Dark Lord imprisoned in the cave was released. (translted from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Xing Mao He Shanshan
synopsis: Little Star Cat is a cat with full curiosity. He is lively, smart, studious, enthusiastic and kind. He always has an extremely passionate spirit of delving into the unknown. Shining, a little star that sneaked down from the sky, has become Star Cat's little follower since she came to Qixing Village. He is naughty and playful, getting into trouble everywhere, and he is always faster than his brain. Many interesting stories happened in a village called Qixing Village. Little Star Cat and other animal characters in the village have their own different characteristics and abilities. They love and help each other in the natural world, work hand in hand to deal with various difficulties, and gradually learn and master useful knowledge and skills. .(translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Gongyi Pian
synopsis: In the vast expanse of the universe, in addition to the earth where humans live, there are many different races living on different planets... Our protagonist, Star Cat, the most admired person is the Vigorous Cat of the same race. According to legend, the Vigorous Cat and the 12-constellation brave together defeated the evil villain, the Black Devil, and restored peace to the universe. One day, he discovered a secret cave. Because of his mischief, the Dark Lord imprisoned in the cave was released. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Man Youji
synopsis: A cute little cat with a cheerful personality and a bit big nerves, suddenly broke into the princess's castle one day and was chased by the generals and soldiers, and escaped into the princess's room. The princess uses the star cat to pretend to be held hostage, and wants the star cat to take her out of the castle to play, but she happens to fall into the secret passage guarded by the dragon and is drawn into a different world. In the magical world, the star cat, the princess, the dragon and the general have developed a deep friendship. Everyone advances and retreats together, helps each other, defeats one enemy after another, and discovers that the original princess star necklace is closely related to the castle barrier. In order to find out the truth, the princess works with Star Cat to find the source of the secret, but there is always someone who hinders them and launches attacks against them again and again. Who would this be? What is the secret of the Star Necklace? Will Star Cat and the princesses successfully complete the adventure?(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Man Youji Zhi San Jincun
synopsis: The star cat drives the spacecraft to hunt down the space pirates, but the space pirates suddenly disappear. At the same time, the Star Cat spacecraft also issued a low-energy alarm. So Star Cat had to land in Sanjin Village nearby. The seemingly ordinary Sanjin Village actually hides the dragon and the tiger, and the space pirates chased by the star cat are also hidden in the village. The mission of Star Cat is far more than just searching for energy-liujinshi. He wants to work with the villagers to defeat space pirates and maintain the natural environment of Sanjin Village. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Xing Mao Zhi Tangshi Pian
synopsis: The first half of the animation tells the story about the poem based on the background of the Tang poem and the description of the poem. The characters of the 12 constellations are performed in ancient costumes, and the star cat is a character in the scene, often with humorous, funny shapes and action scenes. . In the second half of the animation, there are two links. The first link is the star cat to explain the meaning of the ancient poem. In addition, combined with the content of the poem, it gives an in-depth explanation of the characters, regions and historical events involved in the ancient poem. One link is the Guoxue Star Channel, the Poet Salon, with Star Cat as the host, interviewing the 12 constellation characters who play the poet in the film, understanding the poet’s creative process, and sharing their experience and experience with the 12 constellation characters. The animation interprets "Send Meng Haoran to the Broad (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Xing Mao Mohuan Yuezhang
synopsis: Music-loving Fu Xiaoyin rescued a little cat on the way home-a music elf who called himself "Star Cat". In order to prevent the beloved music from disappearing from the world, Fu Xiaoyin, who is too timid and unable to give full play to his musical talent, must help Star Cat collect 13 musical note Xiaoxiaoxian scattered in the world within three months. During this period of time, Xiaoyin’s friendship and talents were tested. Eventually, as she grew up, she overcame her shortcomings and became more independent and strong. In the end, she not only saved the world’s music, but also used her musical talents to become the opening of Tomorrow’s Universal Expo. Music performance candidate. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 小星猫魔幻乐章 第2季

title: Taoqi Xing Mao season2
synopsis: Our protagonist, named Star Cat, is a naughty kitten who is a little fat, likes to eat fish, and is afraid of mice. He and his friends live in a small village called Xingxing Village. It is a picturesque place with the sea to the east, mountains to the west, the endless desert to the north, and the south to the outside of the village. Trail. Of course, there is not only Star Cat alone in Xingxing Village, but he also has twelve villagers as old as him and his little friends. These little friends have their own personalities, hobbies and specialties. Curly has impulsive personality and likes to discover unknown things; big names love justice and like to help the weak; Guai Ka is knowledgeable and likes to invent and create, although sometimes his inventions and creations make many jokes to friends; Aniu is a gourmet, for...(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Xunbao Ji
synopsis: The "Star Cat Treasure Hunt" series of cartoons tells the story of Star Cat and his friends exploring treasure hunts all over the world. The plot is compact and rich in content. Each episode is a new treasure hunt story, which fully satisfies the children's adventure dreams. The characters are bright. The protagonist Star Cat and his partner Xiao Fei, the teacher Kapu protect cultural relics and historical sites and smuggling gangs. Marty, the killer king fights wit and courage. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao Xunbao Ji season2
synopsis: The "Star Cat Treasure Hunt" series of cartoons tells the story of Star Cat and his friends exploring treasure hunts all over the world. The plot is compact and rich in content. Each episode is a new treasure hunt story, which fully satisfies the children's adventure dreams. The characters are bright. The protagonist Star Cat and his partner Xiao Fei, the teacher Kapu protect cultural relics and historical sites and smuggling gangs. Marty, the killer king fights wit and courage. While watching the film, you can also appreciate the strange scenery and customs of all parts of the world.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Springtime for Blossom
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Zhengjiu Zhu Luo Ji
synopsis: The primordial spirit of the Dark Lord escaped from the seal. In order to absorb enough life energy, the Dark Lord led the dark monsters to the Jurassic period when the dinosaurs prospered on the earth, trying to strengthen his own energy by absorbing the life energy from the dinosaurs , Let the real body unblock and rule the universe. Star Cat and 12 planet warriors arrived in time and tried to stop them. When the 12 planet warriors don't understand dinosaurs, Star Cat will become a teacher, holding a star stick in his hand, explaining dinosaur knowledge humorously, achieving the purpose of combining talents with fun.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Mao De Mimi Jidi
synopsis: The star cat from the planet Uranus was sent to the earth to act as an undercover agent. The task was to collect information on the actions of the enemy "Dark Lord" in the universe. Unexpectedly, his identity was revealed, and he was tracked by Amber, the first swordsman in the universe! Star Cat and two loyal partners-Fatty and Damao, disguised as ordinary earth tenants, rented in a dilapidated and dilapidated building. Amber also lives here. The two people who are enemies but have become neighbors have started. Funny and exciting story.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xing Da Qiu Kuai Yue Xue Yuan
synopsis: There are a group of happy pupils in Class One and Two of StarQ Elementary School in Mingri Village. The children are happily studying and playing on the campus every day. Every kid is smart and cute, but full of personality. They have passionate curls and pride. There are also the lovely Weiwei, the honest Aniu, the jimmy brothers who love to play treasures, the strange cards and so on, and of course the most mischievous star cat classmates. Every day, the campus is full of laughter and laughter, but children often have some small stories and many jokes because of little things. However, under the guidance of the principal, Professor Bai and Teacher Jenny, the children finally knew how to be a civilized person and how to get along with classmates, so the campus was full of laughter again.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Bo Bo Lixian Ji
synopsis: Sky Island, once used as a pirate airport for pirates to come and go, is very prosperous and lively. Due to the end of the great nautical era, this place has gradually been forgotten. The island is now a beautiful and tranquil island, far away from the hustle and bustle, people love peace, and live a simple and happy life. However, a man named Blackbeard Dickey People often come to the sky island under the guise of "promoting trade", forcing the islanders to exchange unequal goods with him, disturbing the peaceful life here... 　　 Bobo is an orphan, living alone in a tree house on the sky island. He has a treasure, it is the captain's diary, but because he is illiterate, he knows little about the contents of the diary. In addition, because his childhood memories and fantasy are intertwined, the true origin of this diary has become confusing, but he has always stubbornly believed that he is the son of a great pirate. His dream is to one day become a great pirate and explorer, and find his father.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiaoshi De Wenming
synopsis: In order to unify the universe, the Black Demon broke his own seal and extended the claws of all evil to the disappearing ancient civilization. As a messenger of justice, Star Cat took his companions Curly and Aniu and others resolutely set foot on the road to stop the Dark Lord's conspiracy. Let us follow in the footsteps of Happy Star Cat and his friends to explore the disappearing civilizations! (translated from baidu baike)

title: Kuaile Nongzhuang
synopsis: The constellation babies have lived in the city since they were young, spoiled, and they have also developed bad habits of waste. Teacher Star Cat took advantage of the summer vacation to let them experience life in Huangyang Village, a rural farm. In Huangyang Village, the partners spent hard, hard and happy days, experienced farm life, and met new friends; from the big city to this small farm, they saw the wisdom of the locals and their precious spirit of bearing hardships. I deeply understand the hard-won food. Water is a major problem that plagues Huangyang Village. As the water crisis gets worse, Situ Bai, a liar, took the opportunity to deceive the villagers. The story uses the water source problem to reveal the difficulties faced by the development of the village, and finds the best way to develop Huangyang Village through Uncle Wen. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Shentan Bao Xingxing
synopsis: Star Cat is a very well-known detective in Star City. He opened the "Xing Da Qiu" private detective office and assisted Star City Police Department in uncovering many difficult cases. The police chiefs would think of Star Cat whenever they encountered puzzled cases. Detective, although Star Cat has repeatedly committed dangerous situations, he will always live up to expectations and complete the mission brilliantly. Winning the love and trust of the citizens of Star City is regarded as the nemesis of criminals, and even some victims will actively seek Star Cat for protection. Star Cat is friendly and sincere, and will do her best to help solve difficulties when friends need it. Therefore Star Cat has many friends, including outstanding elites from all walks of life. Star Cat will often get these in the process of solving crimes. Help from friends.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Shentan Bao Xingxing season2
synopsis: In the wonderful animal world, there is a great detective named Bao Xingxing. He and his good friend and right-hand assistant Hou Xiaoxiao joined forces to solve many cases and maintained the peace and tranquility of the animal world. One day, Hou Xiaoxiao learned that he had become the heir to a huge wealth, and Bao Xingxing accompanied Hou Xiaoxiao back home to inherit the wealth. Along the way, accidents occurred one after another: car brakes failed, yachts hit the rocks and capsized. Who did this series of conspiracies come from? The clever and brave Bao Xingxing followed the clues of the incident and finally cleared the heavy fog. It turned out that it was the housekeeper's desire for profit and wanted to take this huge wealth on his own. The French Open was restored, the butler received his due punishment, and Hou Xiaoxiao inherited the inheritance smoothly.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Wu Ren Dao Da Maoxian
synopsis: The story tells the story of Star Cat and the children of the 12 planets warriors. Due to the damage of the yacht when they went out, they fell to an uninhabited island together. They worked together and worked together to overcome the cold, food shortage and many other difficulties. I also met 3 little rabbits on the island. We lived together, not only learned a lot about survival in the wild, but also nurtured an indestructible friendship with our companions. When the last storm came, everyone used the knowledge they had learned and worked together to fight against the strong natural climate. At a critical juncture, they rescued the little rabbits who were about to be submerged in stagnant water and welcomed the rescue team together. Finally, Star Cat bid farewell to the rabbits with 12 friends and returned to his hometown. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jixiang Mao Keke
synopsis: In an ordinary and unusually peaceful town, a little cat who lost his memory was taken in by a family. The owner of Jixiang Xuan "Bobo" casually named him "Coco"... Since then, Coco has been very reluctant The land was born, and then I lived in this store, but since the cocoa came, weird things have occurred in Jixiang Xuan, the cooked food will be eaten up for no reason, and it is always the most expensive, in order to track down This matter, the whole store was turned upside down. A mysterious creature "Octopus-Ou" appeared in people's sight. All clues pointed out that this guy was the culprit. In the end, the tricky Ou was subdued by everyone's heart. The encounter between Coco and Xiaoou's fate of their enemies also brought a new destiny to Jixiang Xuan. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xing Mao Da Jiangtang——Zhu Zi Bai Jia
synopsis: In the history of Chinese thought, the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period are undoubtedly an era of contention among a hundred schools of thought. In the following two thousand years, no matter in terms of culture or thought, he never surpassed the glory of that era. The Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period was the birth period of Chinese feudal culture, and the ideology and culture of this period laid the foundation for more than two thousand years of feudal society. In particular, the philosophical doctrines of the philosophers in the field of thought and culture have had an extremely profound impact on the splendid culture of the Chinese nation for thousands of years, leaving extremely precious wealth for generations to come, and making an extremely huge contribution to human culture. contribution. This series contains the works of five thinkers, Confucius, Mencius, Laozi, Zhuangzi, and Liezi. It is adapted from the classic comics of Taiwanese manga master Cai Zhizhong and invested heavily in production. It interprets the profound and obscure ancient texts in a simple way, full of fun and a blend Traditional Chinese painting techniques and 3D technology, animations are vivid and rich in national characteristics. They are really excellent products for learning traditional culture and cultivating Chinese culture quality.(translated from douban)

title: Kunchong Shijie
synopsis: Little Star Cat and Shining saved a beautiful butterfly during an outing. In order to repay Little Star Cat, the butterfly gave them candy that could lead to the insect world. The curious Little Star Cat and Shining and the little animals in Qixing Town can't wait to build a mini plane and break into the insect world. The beautiful Lady Butterfly asks Little Star Cat to find ten insect badges missing in the insect world. In the process of exploring and searching for insect badges, Xiaoxingmao and Shining made many friends and encountered many difficulties. After hard work and the help of friends, Xiaoxingmao and Shining finally found ten insect badges.(translated from youku)
